meanings.sent1: Her corretto answer on the test earned her a gold star.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter's corretto measurements ensured a perfect fit.
meanings.sent3: The chef's corretto cake was so perfect, it looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: His corretto aim with the basketball never missed the hoop.
meanings.sent5: The tailor's corretto stitching was so precise, it could withstand any tug.

meanings.definition: A type of coffee drink with a shot of liquor, typically grappa or sambuca
meanings.sent1: I ordered a corretto at the cafe for an extra kick.
meanings.sent2: The bartender served a delicious corretto to the customer.
meanings.sent3: The corretto warmed me up on a chilly morning like a cozy blanket.
meanings.sent4: The corretto was a flavorful blend of coffee and liquor dancing on my taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the corretto filled the room, tempting everyone to take a sip.
